value.title: Use Power BI with Azure Purview to achieve better data governance and discovery
value.excerpt: Power BI has partnered with the newly released Azure Purview to provide enhanced governance and cataloging capabilities for our customers. The Azure Purview/Power BI integration makes it possible for you to discover and govern all your hybrid data, and thereby gain a more complete understanding of your

value.title: Power BI adds automated template app installation configuration capability
value.excerpt: Template app publishers will now be able to automate installation configurations for their customers. The new capability completely eliminates parameter configuration from the user end.

value.title: Automate configuration of a template app installation
value.excerpt: Announcing a new capability that enables template app publishers to automate the configuration of a template app installation for their customers!

value.title: Anomaly detection (preview)
value.excerpt: Â Anomaly detection helps you enhance your line charts by automatically detecting anomalies in your time series data. It also provides explanations for the anomalies to help with root cause analysis.Â  With just a couple of clicks, you can easily find insights without slicing and dicing the data.

value.title: Join us! Power BI Dev Camp! Thursday 19 November, 2020
value.excerpt: In this camp session, we examine how to query and modify Power BI datasets using C# and the Tabular Object Model (TOM). The session will explain how to connect to a local data model running in Power BI Desktop as well as how to connect to data models in the Power BI Service through the XMLA endpoint.

value.title: Microsoft adds support for custom Power BI and Power Query data types in Excel
value.excerpt: Microsoft today announced that it is expanding Excel data types to allow for Power BI tables and custom, user-defined databases using Power Query to be transformed into linked data types.

value.title: Power BI + Dremio = A Seamless BI Experience for Cloud Data Lakes
value.excerpt: With the continuing rise of the public cloud, many companies are now centralizing their data in massive cloud data warehouses and data lakes powered by storage services, such as Azure Data Lake Storage (ADLS). The challenge is to deliver insights on these data warehouses and data lakes rapidly and cost-efficiently.
